AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.main_description_p1: I am a full-stack developer with a degree in Computer Science Engineering, focused on developing modern web applications. In my projects, I enjoy using the latest technologies and continuously learning new skills. I like applying my skills and technology to solve problems, which gives me great satisfaction.

hero.title: Restaurant Web Platform & Online Ordering System
hero.description: Responsive restaurant website & online payment, enabling menu management, online ordering, online payments, and customer account management, ensuring user convenience and business operational efficiency.

menu.description: Dynamic Menu: Customers can easily browse the menu, filter products, and add items to the cart.

cart.description: Smart Cart: A clear and user-friendly shopping cart, allowing customers to review, update, or remove items before finalizing the order.

process.description: Ordering Process: A seamless flow from product selection and customization to secure transaction finalization.

payments.description: Secure Payments with Stripe: Customers can securely make transactions using credit cards or digital wallets, with full encryption.

reservations.description: Table Reservations: A simple reservation form with real-time availability checking.

contact.description: Contact Form: A quick way for customers to reach the restaurant with inquiries, feedback, or special requests.

dashboard.description: Dashboard: Provides a clear and intuitive overview of key business metrics for informed decision-making.

products.description: Product Management: Easily add, edit, and organize menu items to keep the restaurant's offering always up-to-date.

orders.description: Order Management: Track, monitor, and update order statuses in real-time to ensure smooth operations.

messages.description: Messages: Efficiently receive and respond to customer messages, streamlining communication.

staff.description: Staff Management: Easily add, edit, and remove users and control their roles and access levels.

reservations.description: Table Reservations Management: Seamlessly view, manage, and update table reservations.

challenge.title: Goal: Digital Transformation in Gastronomy
challenge.text: Modern restaurants need more than just delicious food. In the digital age, efficient management of orders, reservations, and customer relationships is crucial, as is ensuring a smooth online experience. The project aimed to support the restaurant in these areas, increase its online reach, and improve customer service quality by automating key processes and providing tools for effective business management.

solution.title: My Solution: Architecture and Implementation
solution.text: The implemented solution includes a responsive website for the restaurant with online payment system, enabling menu management, online ordering, online payments, and customer account management. The system automates the ordering and reservation processes, integrates payments, and the administrative panel allows for efficient management of customer data and orders. Additionally, analytics mechanisms and tools for monitoring traffic and user behavior were implemented, supporting informed business decisions and increasing staff efficiency.

frontend.title: Frontend – User Interface and Customer Experience:
frontend.text1: For the frontend, I chose React.js combined with Mantine UI, which allowed me to quickly build rich and accessible components. This gives customers an intuitive interface for browsing the menu, customizing orders, and making table reservations. I paid particular attention to responsiveness, ensuring seamless operation on all devices – from desktops to smartphones.
frontend.text2: The management panel is a comprehensive tool that gives staff full control over restaurant operations. From monitoring sales on the dashboard, to managing products, categories, and handling orders, customers, and reservations. The implementation of user roles (admin, moderator, member) ensures precise access control.

backend.title: Backend – The Heart of the System:
backend.text: The backend, built on Node.js using Express.js and the MongoDB database, provides a solid foundation for all operations. I developed a RESTful API that handles the management of products, orders, users, and reservations. Key considerations were ensuring security (JWT for authorization, OAuth for social login) and scalability so the system could grow with the restaurant.

achievements.title: What was achieved:
achievements.f1: Comprehensive Integration: The frontend was connected to the backend, the Stripe payment system, and authorization mechanisms (JWT, Google/Facebook OAuth), creating a coherent and secure application environment.
achievements.f2: Responsive Design: The site adapts to various devices, ensuring consistent operation on both desktops and mobile devices.
achievements.f3: Performance Optimization: Images and content load progressively as the page is used, and server queries were optimized, making the application run smoothly and quickly.
achievements.f4: Efficient Data Management: The system enables efficient processing and control of information within the application.
achievements.f5: Clean Code and Best Practices: The code is modular and easy to maintain, compliant with current industry standards.

f1.title: Increased efficiency
f1.description: Automation of order and reservation handling.

f3.title: Wider reach
f3.description: Availability of the site online and on mobile devices.

hero.title: Restaurant Web Platform & Online Ordering System
hero.description: System for a restaurant, featuring a customer interface and an administrative panel for operational control. Built using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

challenge.title: Goal: Comprehensive Restaurant Management
challenge.text: Running a modern restaurant involves many complex tasks. The goal was to create a system for managing products, orders, reservations, messages, and user accounts—both staff and customers. The system also needed to provide sales data to support subsequent business decisions.

solution.title: My Solution: Full-Stack Architecture
solution.text: I designed and implemented a full-stack application, focusing on modularity, security, and scalability. The system offers separate interfaces for customers and for staff.

customerPanel.title: Customer Panel: Full Control for Users
customerPanel.description: The customer panel allows account management, viewing order history, and updating personal data, including changing the password or permanently deleting the account.

features.f1: Registration and Login: Option to register and log in with email/password, Google, or Facebook.
features.f2: Recent Orders: List of all placed orders with the option to "delete" them (mark as invisible to the customer).
features.f3: Personal Data: View and edit personal information (first name, last name, email, phone, address).
features.f4: Password Change: Secure function to update the password.
features.f5: Option to permanently delete the user account.

adminPanel.title: Administrator Panel: Central Management
adminPanel.description: The administrative panel enables management of products and categories, user and staff accounts, as well as table reservations. The administrator can also read and respond to customer messages directly from the panel.

features.f1: Dashboard: A clear overview of key business metrics for informed decision-making.
features.f2: Product Management: Easy adding, editing, and organizing of menu items.
features.f4: Category Management: Full CRUD operations for product categories.
features.f5: Customer Management: Easy adding, modifying, and deleting customer accounts, and control over their data and permissions.
features.f6: Order Management: Real-time tracking, monitoring, and updating of order statuses.
features.f7: Messages: Efficiently receiving and responding to customer messages.
features.f8: Table Reservation Management: Seamless viewing, editing, and updating of reservations.
features.f9: Staff Management: Full CRUD operations for staff accounts with role assignment.
features.f10: Application Settings: Managing global reservation settings, SMTP configuration, and other system parameters.

items.f1: Authorization: Implementation of JWT tokens, OAuth2 (Google/Facebook), and role-based access control for secure user and staff management.
items.f2: Data Management: Use of MongoDB with Mongoose for flexible and scalable data operations, supporting complex structures for products, orders, and users.
items.f3: API: RESTful API in Node.js/Express.js covering CRUD operations for all key entities (products, orders, users, reservations, messages, staff, categories).
items.f4: Payments: Stripe integration for online payments, including webhook handling for automatic order status updates.
items.f5: Real-time statistics and reporting: Endpoints for sales statistics, visit tracking, and dashboard overview.
items.f6: Responsive UI: Design in React.js and Mantine UI, ensuring a consistent user experience on all devices.
items.f7: Clean Code and Best Practices: Adherence to industry standards for modular and maintainable code, including error handling and structured logging.

hero.title: Leśniczówka Wieżyca: Resort Platform & Booking System
hero.description: This site is the official online platform for Leśniczówka Wieżyca, a tranquil resort located in the picturesque Kashubian region of Poland. The main goal of the service is to attractively present the resort's amenities – including cozy rooms, seasonal Dutch chalets, and a SPA with a jacuzzi and sauna – and to provide a smooth, comprehensive online booking process. The key challenge solved by the platform is converting user interest into confirmed stays through an efficient self-service system.

challenge.title: Goal: Digital Transformation in the Accommodation Industry
challenge.text: Leśniczówka Wieżyca required a digital transformation focused on maximizing conversions, where the main challenge was converting initial user interest into confirmed stays. This was achieved by implementing a self-service online booking system integrated with a new, responsive platform. The result is the automation of accommodation sales processes, which minimizes manual workload and increases the facility's direct revenue.

solution.title: Solution: Website with Integrated Booking and Payment System
solution.text: The site includes a comprehensive booking module that gives guests full control over planning their stay, eliminating the need for manual communication to check availability and make initial payments.

f1.description: Real-time Availability and Search Engine: Guests can instantly search for available accommodations by providing dates and the number of people, receiving results immediately.

f2.description: Secure Online Booking: The user goes through a smooth, intuitive booking process for individual, group, or package stays.

f3.description: Integrated Online Payments: Guests can securely conduct financial transactions directly on the site, instantly confirming their reservation.

f4.description: Content and Service Presentation: Detailed information about the resort's offer, accommodation types, event organization, and local attractions.

f5.description: Gallery: A visually rich collection of photos showcasing the resort, rooms, amenities, and events to help guests better imagine their stay.

f6.description: Contact Form: An easy-to-use form allowing guests to ask questions, request information, or contact the resort for personalized assistance.

f7.description: Responsive Design: The site is optimized for all devices, ensuring comfortable use on phones and tablets.

f8.description: Admin Panel: A full overview of all reservations with the ability to manage statuses and make quick modifications.

f9.description: Admin Calendar: A visual calendar for tracking reservations and efficiently managing availability.

achievements.title: Implementation:
achievements.f1: Integration with Eagle Booking: The plugin was configured to manage reservations, room availability, and online payments.
achievements.f2: Reservation Process Optimization: Booking forms and payment flow were customized to ensure a smooth guest experience.
achievements.f3: WordPress Theme Customization: The WordPress theme was adapted to match the visual identity of Leśniczówka Wieżyca.
achievements.f4: Content Management and SEO: WordPress tools were utilized for content management and search engine optimization.
achievements.f5: Staff Training: Resort employees were trained in operating the WordPress administrative panel and managing reservations.

f1.title: Operational Automation:
f1.description: The digital booking and payment system replaced manual phone or email reservations, significantly reducing administrative workload and minimizing the risk of errors.

f2.title: Increased Direct Sales:
f2.description: The platform allows guests to book directly through the website, reducing reliance on external portals and lowering commission costs.

f3.title: Improved Financial Flow:
f3.description: Integrated payment handling ensures immediate reservation confirmation and quick fund transfers to the resort, eliminating delays and uncertainty.

f4.title: Better Guest Experience:
f4.description: The intuitive interface, real-time availability, and responsive design create a smooth and reliable process from browsing the offer to making a reservation.
